answerText: Hymns to the Night [or Hymnen an die Nacht][10] Novalis was a student of this German writer, who penned "Ode to Joy" and wrote the plays The Robbers and Don Carlos.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 6 | 7 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The last poem in this set states that we can never quench our thirst with this world's waters, and the speaker describes a downtrodden man who thinks only of the past. [10] Name this set of six poems and prose pieces written by Novalis that was inspired by the death of the author's fianc√©e Sophie von Kuhn, the last of which is sometimes called "Longing for Death."
